interface.name: net.protosystem.GarageDoorStatistics
interface.description: Interface for exposing some statistics about the grarage door

property.name: Location
property.description: The location in the house this device is

property.name: OpenCountSinceLastService
property.description: The number of times the door has been opened since the last time it was serviced

property.name: ClosedCountSinceLastService
property.description: The number of times the door has been closed since the last time it was serviced

property.name: OpenCountByDay
property.description: The number of times the door has been opened for today

property.name: CloseCountByDay
property.description: The number of times the door has been closed for today

property.name: OpenCountLastSevenDays
property.description: The number of times the door has been opened for the last seven days

property.name: CloseCountLastSevenDays
property.description: The number of times the door has been closed for the last seven days
